comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: Thanks for the comment, Eric in SF. The birth year in the title has been updated!

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The birth year in the title may still be wrong, but for different reasons.... WorldCat and the University of Iowa both list her as born in 1899; her husband was born in 1900, and they met when both were undergraduates in 1921; she died in 1995, which makes the later birth date far more believable. A recent edition of The Rock Book by the Fentons mentions that she died 3 December 1995, at the age of 96. Her obituary in American Paleontologist 4(1)(1996): 15, gives her dates as 1899-1995. The University of Iowa Special Collections (where the Fenton papers are held) could confirm that for sure. www.lib.uiowa.edu/spec-coll/MSC/ToMsC650/MsC602/fenton.htm I found a biographical article cited, but I don't have access to it: S. George Pemberton and James A. MacEachern (1994). "Carroll Lane Fenton and Mildred Adams Fenton: Pioneers of North American Neoichnology," Ichnos: An International Journal for Plant and Animal Traces 3(2): 145-153.

comment._content: Just to confirm others details, the Social Security Death Index lists a Mildred A Fenton, b. 14 Nov 1899, d. 07 Dec 1995, with last benefit paid in 52246 Iowa City IA
